ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Can Anyone Help?
ygData.msgSnippet: The cd key is tied to the account name and password. A subscription card or credit card won t help you get past this hurdle. If you knew the person who sold
ygData.messageBody:
The cd key is tied to the account name and password. A subscription
card or credit card won't help you get past this hurdle. If you knew
the person who sold the software, you could ask them for the name and
password. But it's doubtful you would get it and even more risky as
their information is registered as the owner of the account. Your
best bet would be to either buy the 9.99 cheapy basic EQ to get a
fresh cd key or find the new jumbo pack which contains most of the
expansions along with the basic eq game. It is supposed to retail for
29.99.

Timmye Cousteau
45 Wolf of Karana

> member, but as far as I know the CD key is only for
> the free month, and if it is second hand, that means
> someone has already used up da free month, go buy
> yourself a subscription card or use a credit card and
> that should fix the problem... but, I might be wrong,
> if anyone else knows and good tricks post em... like
> I said I could be wrong
>
> Willim Lupin
> ret. 40th season war
> Tribunal
>
>
